attributes.action: Ensure Leeds United are docked 10 points at the start of next season.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only reason they went into Administration was to avoid a negative point start next season, The 10 point rule was intended to be a punishment, which hardly applies in their case, as they were already down.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
